title.en: Voltage Controlled Cassette Organ - Sound Examples

content.no:
Med [Voltage Controlled Cassette Organ](products/voltage-controlled-cassette-organ/) f친r du den ikoniske lyden av [Korg CX-3](equipment/instruments/korg-cx-3/) sammen med den umiskjennelige sjarmen til kassettopptak. Den fanger essensen av organets analoge oscillatorer s친 vel som pitch-fluktuasjonen, harmonisk forvrengning og farging forbundet med kassettopptak.
Hver tone for hver drawbar og "key click", har blitt samplet som individuelle lydfiler, noe som gir autentisk og detaljrik lyd.
Innspillingene har blitt gjort to ganger p친 kassettb친nd, noe som resulterer i en "double track"-effekt som tilf칮rer dybde. Takket v칝re ujevnhetene til mekanikken i b친ndopptakeren og selve b친ndet, gir hver avspilling et litt annerledes resultat.
Biblioteket inkluderer ogs친 impulsresponser for to typer b친ndekko og to typer romklang.

Historien bak:
Jeg oppdaget at n친r jeg tok opp [Korg CX-3](equipment/instruments/korg-cx-3/) p친 kassettb친nd, dukket det opp noen artefakter som forvandlet lyden. Wow- og flutter-effektene, sammen med de tilfeldige fluktueringene, skapte en bevegelse i lyden som minner om chorus/vibrato-effekt eller dopplereffekten fra en roterende h칮yttaler. I motsetning til tradisjonelle modulasjonseffektene med jevn hastighet, introduserte kassettb친ndet en mer tilfeldig og organisk modulasjon.

Instrument-presets:
For 친 sikre optimal ytelse og fleksibilitet tilbyr biblioteket to presets: En ganske ressurskrevende "All Drawbars"-preset med 9 drawbars og en "Single Drawbar"-preset som sparer ressurser ved 친 spille av f칝rre lydfiler per tangent. Preset'en "Single Drawbar" har imidlertid lydfiler fra forskjellige drawbars for et utvidet oktavspenn.
- All Drawbars:
   - Preset'en "All Drawbars" spiller av 20 forskjellige lydfiler per tangent, noe som resulterer i en rik og kompleks lyd. Det krever imidlertid betydelige ressurser, spesielt n친r du spiller breie akkorder.
- Single Drawbar:
   - Som et mer ressursvennlig alternativ spiller preset'en "Single Drawbar" bare fire lydfiler per tangent. Denne preset'en inneholder ogs친 ekstra knotter for justering av decay-kurve og release-kurve for envelope'n.

Brukergrensesnitt:
Utforsk parametere for 친 stille inn lyden din med kontroll over ni drawbars, "key click", envelope, amplitudemodulasjon med LFO-er, "double track" og effekter for ekko og romklang.
- ADSR-envelope:
  - Form lyden din n칮yaktig med parametrene Attack, Decay, Sustain og Release. Enten du 칮nsker en punchy, staccato-tone eller en jevn, dvelende atmosf칝re, lar ADSR-envelope'n deg skreddersy dynamikken etter din smak.
  - Envelope-kurver:
    - For enda mer kontroll over envelope'n kan du endre kurven for attack-tid. Preset'en "Single Drawbar" har ogs친 to ekstra knotter for decay-kurve og release-kurve. Decay-kurven og release-kurven er eksponentielle for preset'en "All Drawbars".
- LFO:
  - LFO Rate og LFO Depth-knappene lar deg modulere amplituden til trekkstengene med 칮nsket dybde og hastighet.
- Drawbars:
  - Hver drawbar kontrollerer amplituden til en spesifikk harmonisk overtone.
  - Dessverre st칮tter ikke DecentSampler omvendt vertikal kontroll for drawbars, noe som betyr at du m친 klikke og dra musepekeren oppover for 친 f친 drawbar'en til 친 g친 nedover. Jeg har sendt inn en foresp칮rsel til Decent Sampler ang. dette.
- Key click:
  - Key click gir en liten transient i starten av anslaget og kan f.eks brukes til 친 emulere en stikke som sl친r p친 et slaginstrument eller et plekter som plukker en streng.
- Double track:
  - Hver lydfil har blitt spilt inn to ganger og kan mikses sammen for en "chorus"-effekt eller panoreres for en stereoeffekt.
  - P친 grunn av b친ndmaskin-mekanikken og selve b친ndet, vil lyden v칝re litt annerledes for hver gang den tas opp og spilles av.
- Effekter:
  - Ekko-effekten er en [Fulltone Tube Tape Echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) (b친ndekko) spilt inn to ganger for stereo, mens reverb-effekten er en [Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978](equipment/effects/chase-bliss-audio-and-meris-cxm-1978/) klang-pedal satt til romklang.
  - Ekko:
    - Velg mellom to typer ekko: "Short", som gir en klassisk slapback-effekt, og "long", er en langsom ekko med mange repetisjoner.
  - Reverb:
    - Du finner ogs친 to romklangeffekter: "Short", som er et lite, intimt rom, og "long", som er et stort rom med lang etterklangstid.
content.en:
You'll get the iconic sound of the [Korg CX-3](equipment/instruments/korg-cx-3/), infused with the unmistakable charm of cassette tape recording, with the [Voltage Controlled Cassette Organ](products/voltage-controlled-cassette-organ/). It captures the essence of the organs analog oscillators as well as the pitch fluctuation (wow/flutter), harmonic distortion, and coloration associated with cassette tape recordings.
Each note for every drawbar, as well as the sound of the key click, has been meticulously sampled as individual audio files, ensuring authenticity and attention to detail.
To achieve an even richer sound, the organ has been recorded twice onto cassette tape, resulting in a double-track effect that adds depth and character. Thanks to the inherent idiosyncrasies of tape deck mechanics and the tape itself, each playback yields a slightly different result.
It also includes impulse responses for two tape delay/echo types and two room reverbs.

The Story:
I discovered that the [Korg CX-3](equipment/instruments/korg-cx-3/), when sampled through cassette tape, introduced some imperfections that transformed the sound. The wow and flutter effects, along with the random warbles, created a fascinating movement reminiscent of a chorus/vibrato or the doppler effect from a rotary speaker. However, unlike traditional modulation effects with fixed speed, the cassette tape introduced a more random and organic quality to the modulation.

Instrument presets:
To ensure optimal performance and flexibility, the library offers two presets: A quite resource-intensive "All Drawbars" preset with 9 drawbars and a "Single Drawbar" preset which conserves resources by playing back fewer samples per key. The "Single Drawbar" preset does however have samples from different drawbars for an extended key range.
- All Drawbars:
  - The "All Drawbars" preset plays back 20 different samples per note, resulting in a rich and complex sound. However, it does demand significant system resources, especially when playing big chords.
- Single Drawbar:
  - As a more resource-friendly alternative, the "Single Drawbar" preset plays back only four samples per key. This preset also incorporates additional knobs for adjusting the envelope decay curve and release curve, maximizing your creative control.

User Interface:
Explore parameters to refine your sound, including control over the nine drawbars, key click volume, envelope, amplitude modulation with LFOs, double track, and the immersive effects of echo and reverb.
- ADSR Envelope:
  - Shape your sound precisely with the Attack, Decay, Sustain, and Release parameters. Whether you desire a punchy, staccato tone or a smooth, lingering ambiance, the ADSR envelope allows you to tailor the dynamics to your liking.
  - Envelope curves:
    - For even more control over the envelope, you can change the curve of the attack time. The "Single Drawbar" preset also incorporates two additional knobs for decay curve and release curve. The decay curve and release curve are exponential for the "All Drawbars" preset.
- LFO:
  - The LFO Rate and LFO Depth knobs enable you to modulate the amplitude of the drawbars with the desired depth and rate.
- Drawbars:
  - Each drawbar controls the amplitude of a specific harmonic overtone, offering you unparalleled control over the instrument's harmonic richness.
  - Unfortunately DecentSampler doesn't support reversed/inverted vertical control for drawbars which means you have to click and drag the mouse upwards to make the drawbar go downwards. I have however submitted a feature request for this.
- Key click:
  - The click's percussive nature, akin to the striking of a mallet on a percussion instrument, provided a lively and vibrant attack to the notes played on the organ.
- Double track:
  - Each sample has been recorded twice and can be mixed together for a "chorus" effect or panned for a stereo effect.
  - Because of the nature of the tape deck mechanics and the tape itself, the sound will be a bit different for every time it's recorded and played back.
- Effects:
  - These effects are achieved using carefully crafted impulse responses. The echo effect employs a [Fulltone Tube Tape Echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) recorded twice for stereo, while the reverb effect draws from a [Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978](equipment/effects/chase-bliss-audio-and-meris-cxm-1978/) reverb pedal with a room setting.
  - Echo:
    - Select from two distinctive echo options: the short echo, delivering a classic slapback effect, and the long echo, characterized by a slower decay and numerous repeats.
  - Reverb:
    - You'll also find two reverb effects: the short reverb, evoking the intimacy of a small room, and the long reverb, enveloping your sound in the vastness of a spacious environment.

title.no: Wurli med kontaktmikrofon, whammy og b친ndekko
title.en: Wurli with contact mic, whammy and tape echo

content.no:
Pr칮vde 친 lage en intim og delvis 칮delagt pianolyd med [Wurlitzer 200A](equipment/instruments/wurlitzer-200a/), kontaktmikrofon, [whammy-pedal](equipment/effects/digitech-whammy-5th-gen/), [b친ndekko](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) og diverse effekter 游띶 游붃
- Kontaktmikrofonen er mikset sammen med internal pickup
- De lyse E notene er spilt inn separat 游꿫
- Whammy-signalet er mikset in med direktelyden
- P친 de lyse E notene er [whammy'en](equipment/effects/digitech-whammy-5th-gen/) kun brukt p친 ekkolyden
- Vrengen kommer fra en [Fender Twin Reverb forsterker](equipment/amplifiers/fender-twin-reverb/) og en [Hudson Broadcast pedal](equipment/effects/hudson-electronics-uk-broadcast/)
- Signalet er sendt gjennom en [Hairball Audio FET/RACK (1176)](equipment/effects/hairball-audio-fet-rack-revision-d/) for litt mild kompresjon og farging
- Forsterkeren er mikket opp med en Shure SM-57 og en Royer R-121
- Klangen er en kort romklang fra [Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978](equipment/effects/chase-bliss-audio-and-meris-cxm-1978/)
Instrument: [Wurlitzer 200A](equipment/instruments/wurlitzer-200a/).
Effekter: [DigiTech Whammy (5th Gen)](equipment/effects/digitech-whammy-5th-gen/), [Fulltone Tube Tape Echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/), [Hairball Audio FET/RACK Revision D](equipment/effects/hairball-audio-fet-rack-revision-d/), [Hudson Electronics, UK Broadcast](equipment/effects/hudson-electronics-uk-broadcast/), [Fulltone Supa-Trem](equipment/effects/fulltone-supa-trem/) og [Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978](equipment/effects/chase-bliss-audio-and-meris-cxm-1978/).
Forsterker: [Fender Twin Reverb](equipment/amplifiers/fender-twin-reverb/).
Mikrofoner: Shure SM-57 og Royer R-121.
content.en:
Tried to make an intimate and kind of broken piano sound with the [Wurlitzer 200A](equipment/instruments/wurlitzer-200a/), contact mic, [whammy pedal](equipment/effects/digitech-whammy-5th-gen/), [tape echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) and different effects 游띶 游붃
- The contact mic is mixed in with the internal pickup
- The high E notes is recorded in a separate take 游꿫
- The whammy signal is mixed in with the original signal
- On the high E notes the [whammy](equipment/effects/digitech-whammy-5th-gen/) is only on the echoes
- The overdrive comes from a [Fender Twin Reverb amp](equipment/amplifiers/fender-twin-reverb/) and a [Hudson Broadcast pedal](equipment/effects/hudson-electronics-uk-broadcast/)
- It's recorded through a [Hairball Audio FET/RACK (1176)](equipment/effects/hairball-audio-fet-rack-revision-d/) for some mild compression and coloration
- The amplifier is miced with a Shure SM-57 and a Royer R-121
- The reverb is a short/small room reverb from a [Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978](equipment/effects/chase-bliss-audio-and-meris-cxm-1978/)
Instrument: [Wurlitzer 200A](equipment/instruments/wurlitzer-200a/).
Effects: [DigiTech Whammy (5th Gen)](equipment/effects/digitech-whammy-5th-gen/), [Fulltone Tube Tape Echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/), [Hairball Audio FET/RACK Revision D](equipment/effects/hairball-audio-fet-rack-revision-d/), [Hudson Electronics, UK Broadcast](equipment/effects/hudson-electronics-uk-broadcast/), [Fulltone Supa-Trem](equipment/effects/fulltone-supa-trem/) and [Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978](equipment/effects/chase-bliss-audio-and-meris-cxm-1978/)
Amplifier: [Fender Twin Reverb](equipment/amplifiers/fender-twin-reverb/).
Microphones: Shure SM-57 and Royer R-121.

title.en: Free Omnichord sample plugin (Omni-84)

content.no:
En kjapp demo av Omni-84 for Decent Sampler.
For 칮yeblikket produseres ikke [Omnichord](equipment/instruments/suzuki-omnichord-om-84-system-two/) og prisene p친 bruktmarkedet har skutt i v칝ret. Dette er mitt fors칮k p친 친 gj칮re lyden av [Omnichord](equipment/instruments/suzuki-omnichord-om-84-system-two/) mer tilgjengelig.
Alle lydene fra [Omnichord'en](equipment/instruments/suzuki-omnichord-om-84-system-two/) har blitt samplet til individuelle lydfiler.
Jeg har ogs친 lagt til effektene jeg pleier 친 bruke p친 [Omnichord](equipment/instruments/suzuki-omnichord-om-84-system-two/) som en impulsrespons kalt "space".
Instrument-presets: Lydbiblioteket inneholder 5 presets, 칠n for hver del av [Omnichord'en](equipment/instruments/suzuki-omnichord-om-84-system-two/). Trommer, bass, akkorder, keyboard og SonicStrings.
Teknisk spesifikasjon: Samplingsfrekvens: 48 kHz, bitdybde: 24 bit, antall lydfiler: 277, filst칮rrelse for lydfiler: 241,3 MB, kanaler: 1 (mono), 2 (stereo) for impulsrespons.
Lydfiler: 22 trommelyder, 19 basslyder, 84 akkordlyder, 32 keyboardlyder og 120 SonicStrings-lyder.
Impulsrespons (space): Roland PA-120 forforsterker, [Fulltone Tube Tape Echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/), Roland PA-120 fj칝rklang og [Roland Dimension D SDD-320](equipment/effects/roland-dimension-d-sdd-320/).
Impulssignalet ble sendt gjennom en kanal p친 Roland PA-120-mikseren slik at den innebygde fj칝rklangen samt en [b친ndekko](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) i effektsl칮yfen kunne brukes. Forforsterkeren i mikseren tilf칮rer ogs친 fin farging og forvrengning. Mikseren og effektene er i mono, s친 jeg kj칮rte lyden gjennom en [Dimension D](equipment/effects/roland-dimension-d-sdd-320/) for 친 gj칮re den om til stereo og legge til litt ekstra modulasjon.
content.en:
A short demo of the Omni-84 library for Decent Sampler in action.
At the moment, the [Omnichord](equipment/instruments/suzuki-omnichord-om-84-system-two/) is no longer produced and prices on the second-hand market have skyrocketed. This is my attempt to make the sound of the [Omnichord](equipment/instruments/suzuki-omnichord-om-84-system-two/) more accessible.
Every sound of the [Omnichord](equipment/instruments/suzuki-omnichord-om-84-system-two/) has been sampled into individual audio files.
I've also added the effects I tend to use when recording and playing the [Omnichord](equipment/instruments/suzuki-omnichord-om-84-system-two/) as an impulse response called "space".
Instrument presets: This sample library includes 5 presets, one for each part of the [Omnichord](equipment/instruments/suzuki-omnichord-om-84-system-two/). Drums, Bass, Chords, Keyboard and SonicStrings.
Technical specification: Sample rate: 48 kHz, bit depth: 24 bit, number of samples: 277, file size for samples: 241.3 MB, channels: 1 (mono), 2 (stereo) for impulse response.
Audio files: 22 drum samples, 19 bass samples, 84 chord samples, 32 keyboard samples and 120 SonicStrings samples.
Impulse response (Space): Roland PA-120 preamp, [Fulltone Tube Tape Echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/), Roland PA-120 spring reverb and [Roland Dimension D SDD-320](equipment/effects/roland-dimension-d-sdd-320/).
The impulse signal was sent through a channel on the Roland PA-120 mixer so that the built-in spring reverb as well as a [tape echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) in the effects loop could be used. The preamplifier in the mixer also adds some nice saturation. The mixer and effects are all mono, so I ran it through a [Dimension D](equipment/effects/roland-dimension-d-sdd-320/) to make it stereo and add some extra modulation.

title.no: Rhodes Mark I Stage Piano med kontaktmikrofon
title.en: Rhodes Mark I Stage Piano with contact mic

content.no:
Spiller inn [Rhodes Mark I elektrisk piano](equipment/instruments/rhodes-mark-i-stage-piano/) med en kontaktmikrofon (piezo pickup) for 친 fremheve mekanisk st칮y fra tines og tangenter. Signalet fra kontaktmikrofonen er s친 mikset inn med direktesignalet.
Det siste eksempelet er mikset med en Roland PA-120 og jeg brukte den interne fj칝rklangen samt en [b친ndekko](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) og en [digital stereo-klang](equipment/effects/chase-bliss-audio-and-meris-cxm-1978/). Signalet ble s친 spilt inn p친 kassett for litt ekstra farging.
Instrument: [Rhodes Mark I Stage Piano](equipment/instruments/rhodes-mark-i-stage-piano/).
Effekter: Roland PA-120 fj칝rklang, [Fulltone Tube Tape Echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) and [Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978](equipment/effects/chase-bliss-audio-and-meris-cxm-1978/).
Mikser: Roland PA-120.
B친ndopptaker: Fostex X-28H.
content.en:
Recording the [Rhodes Mark I electric piano](equipment/instruments/rhodes-mark-i-stage-piano/) with a contact microphone (piezo pickup) to capture the mechanical noise from the tines and keys. The signal from the contact mic is then blended in with the direct signal.
The last example is mixed down with Roland PA-120 and I used the internal spring reverb as well as a [tape echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) and a [digital stereo reverb](equipment/effects/chase-bliss-audio-and-meris-cxm-1978/). The signal was then recorded it to a cassette tape for some extra color and saturation.
Instrument: [Rhodes Mark I Stage Piano](equipment/instruments/rhodes-mark-i-stage-piano/).
Effects: Roland PA-120 spring reverb, [Fulltone Tube Tape Echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) and [Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978](equipment/effects/chase-bliss-audio-and-meris-cxm-1978/).
Mixer: Roland PA-120.
Tape recorder: Fostex X-28H.

content.no:
Tester Roland PA-120 mikser med en liten synth-jam.
Lyden er innspilt direkte fra mikserens linjeutgang.
Klangen kommer fra den innebygde fj칝rklangen i mikseren og ekkoet kommer fra en [Fulltone Tube Tape Echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) koblet til effektsl칮yfa / inn og -utgang for ekko p친 mikseren.
En [Korg Polysix](equipment/instruments/korg-polysix/) (utenfor bildet) spiller arpeggioene og jeg skrur p친/av kanalen p친 mikseren.
Instrumenter: [Korg Polysix](equipment/instruments/korg-polysix/), [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/), [Dreadbox Erebus v2](equipment/instruments/dreadbox-erebus-v2/), [Doepfer Dark Energy](equipment/instruments/doepfer-dark-energy/) og [Roland SH-09](equipment/instruments/roland-sh-09/).
Effekter: Roland PA-120 fj칝rklang og [Fulltone Tube Tape Echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/).
Mikser: Roland PA-120.
content.en:
Testing the Roland PA-120 mixer with a short dawless synthesizer jam.
The audio is recorded directly from the line out of the mixer.
The reverb comes from the in-built spring reverb in the mixer and the echo/delay comes from the [Fulltone Tube Tape Echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) connected to the effects loop / echo ins and outs of the mixer.
A [Korg Polysix](equipment/instruments/korg-polysix/) (out of the frame) plays the arpeggiator and I just unmute and mute the track with the mixer.
Instruments: [Korg Polysix](equipment/instruments/korg-polysix/), [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/), [Dreadbox Erebus v2](equipment/instruments/dreadbox-erebus-v2/), [Doepfer Dark Energy](equipment/instruments/doepfer-dark-energy/) and [Roland SH-09](equipment/instruments/roland-sh-09/).

Jeg la ogs친 p친 litt romklang fra [Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978](equipment/effects/chase-bliss-audio-and-meris-cxm-1978/) og spilte det inn p친 kassett for litt ekstra farging.

Recording the [Wurlitzer 200A electric piano](equipment/instruments/wurlitzer-200a/) with a contact mic (piezo pickup) to capture the mechanical noise from the keys and sustain pedal. The signal from the contact mic is then blended in with the direct signal.

title.en: The Clavinet solo sound of "Kaasin - Hidden"

content.no:
De forskjellige sporene som tilsammen utgj칮r [Clavinet](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/)-sololyden i l친ta Hidden av Kaasin.
Trommene spilles av Chris Brush.
[Clavinet'en](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/) er spilt inn med en DI-boks 칠n gang og s친 re-amp'et flere ganger for de forskjellige sporene. Den eneste effekten som er brukt ved innspilling av DI-signalet er en [Real McCoy Custom Picture Wah](equipment/effects/real-mccoy-custom-picture-wah/) p친 den siste delen av soloen.
[Clavinet](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/)-sololyden best친r av 6 spor.
Spor 1 & 2 (Fuzz): DI-signalet er re-amp'et to ganger med forskjellig fuzz-pedaler. En [Fuzz Face](equipment/effects/dallas-arbiter-fuzz-face/) og en [Iron Bell](equipment/effects/mojo-hand-fx-iron-bell/). Begge fuzz-pedalene er kj칮rt gjennom en [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/) inn i en [Vox AC15H1TV](equipment/amplifiers/vox-ac15h1tv/), mikket opp med en Shure SM57. De to fuzz-sporene er panorert litt(25%) til hver sin side.
Spor 3 (Punch): DI-signalet er kj칮rt gjennom en [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/) inn i en [Vox AC15H1TV](equipment/amplifiers/vox-ac15h1tv/) mikket opp med en Shure SM57. Det innspilte sporet er s친 kraftig komprimert med en CLA-76 (1176 plugin) og en CLA-2A (LA-2A plugin). CLA-76-kompressoren har en ganske sein attack-tid for 친 fremheve transientene og gi mer "punch".
Spor 4, 5 & 6 (Rotary effect): DI-signalet er kj칮rt gjennom en [Electro-Harmonix English Muff'n](equipment/effects/electro-harmonix-english-muffn/) og en [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/) inn i en [Solton Dopplertone forsterker](equipment/amplifiers/solton-dopplertone/). Det 칮vre hornet er mikket opp med et stereopar Shure SM57 og panorert hardt til hver side, mens den nedre rotoren er mikket opp med en Sennheiser e 602-II.

Instrument: [Hohner Clavinet D6](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/).
Effekter: [Real McCoy Custom Picture Wah](equipment/effects/real-mccoy-custom-picture-wah/), [Dunlop / Dallas Arbiter '93 Fuzz Face](equipment/effects/dallas-arbiter-fuzz-face/), [Mojo Hand FX Iron Bell](equipment/effects/mojo-hand-fx-iron-bell/), [Electro-Harmonix English Muff'n](equipment/effects/electro-harmonix-english-muffn/) og [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/)
Forsterkere: [Vox AC15H1TV](equipment/amplifiers/vox-ac15h1tv/) og [Solton Dopplertone](equipment/amplifiers/solton-dopplertone/).
Plugins: Waves Audio CLA-76 og Waves Audio CLA-2A.
content.en:
The different tracks that make up the [Clavinet](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/) solo sound on the song Hidden.
The drums are played and recorded by Chris Brush.
The [Clavinet](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/) is recorded with a DI-box once and then re-amped multiple times for the different tracks. The only effects used on the DI signal is a [Real McCoy Custom Picture Wah](equipment/effects/real-mccoy-custom-picture-wah/) on the last part of the solo.
The [Clavinet](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/) solo sound consists of 6 tracks.
Track 1 & 2 (Fuzz): The DI-signal is re-amped two times with different fuzz pedals. A [Fuzz Face](equipment/effects/dallas-arbiter-fuzz-face/) and an [Iron Bell](equipment/effects/mojo-hand-fx-iron-bell/). Both fuzz pedals is ran through a [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/) into a [Vox AC15H1TV](equipment/amplifiers/vox-ac15h1tv/) mic'd up with a Shure SM57. The two fuzz tracks is panned slightly(25%) to each side.
Track 3 (Punch): The DI-signal is ran through a [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/) into a [Vox AC15H1TV](equipment/amplifiers/vox-ac15h1tv/) mic'd up with a Shure SM57. The recorded track is then heavily compressed with CLA-76 (1176 plugin) and CLA-2A (LA-2A plugin). The CLA-76 has a pretty slow attack to accentuate the transients for more punch.
Track 4, 5 & 6 (Rotary effect): The DI-signal is ran through an [Electro-Harmonix English Muff'n](equipment/effects/electro-harmonix-english-muffn/) and a [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/) into a [Solton Dopplertone rotary speaker](equipment/amplifiers/solton-dopplertone/). The upper horn is mic'd up with a stereo pair of Shure SM57 panned hard to each side and the lower rotor is mic'd up with a Sennheiser e 602-II.

Instrument: [Hohner Clavinet D6](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/).
Effects: [Real McCoy Custom Picture Wah](equipment/effects/real-mccoy-custom-picture-wah/), [Dunlop / Dallas Arbiter '93 Fuzz Face](equipment/effects/dallas-arbiter-fuzz-face/), [Mojo Hand FX Iron Bell](equipment/effects/mojo-hand-fx-iron-bell/), [Electro-Harmonix English Muff'n](equipment/effects/electro-harmonix-english-muffn/) and [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/)
Amplifiers: [Vox AC15H1TV](equipment/amplifiers/vox-ac15h1tv/) and [Solton Dopplertone](equipment/amplifiers/solton-dopplertone/).
Plugins: Waves Audio CLA-76 and Waves Audio CLA-2A.

title.en: Kaasin - We Are One

content.no:
"We Are One" er en l친t hentet fra det norske rockebandet Kaasin's debut album "Fired Up" (utgitt: 19. November 2021)!
Kaasin har sluppet two singler "Runaway Train" og "Revelation" p친 Streampeak Music in 2020.
Kaasin gav ut sin tredje singel, "Hidden" p친 Pride & Joy Music i July 2021, som er den f칮rste singelen fra det kommende albumet "Fired Up".
Spilt inn hos Dehli Musikk, B칮 i Telemark og Juke Joint Studio, Notodden.
Produsert av Benjamin Dehli, Halvor Halvorsen & Kaasin
Mixet/mastret av Leif Johansen
Video av Jon Sandersen
Plateselskap: Pride & Joy Music
Musikere: Jan Thore Grefstad (vokal), Staale Kaasin (bass), Jo Henning Kaasin (gitar), Benjamin Dehli (tangenter), Chris Brush (trommer) og Per-Morten Bergseth (trommer i video)
content.en:
"We Are One" is a track taken from Norwegian Classic Rock act Kaasin's debut album "Fired Up" (released: November 19th, 2021)!
Kaasin released two singles "Runaway Train" and "Revelation" on Streampeak Music in 2020. 
Kaasin released a third single, "Hidden" on Pride & Joy Music in July 2021, i.e.the first single from the upcoming album, "Fired Up".
Recorded and engineered at Dehli Musikk, B칮 in Telemark and Juke Joint Studio, Notodden.
Produced by Benjamin Dehli, Halvor Halvorsen & Kaasin
Mixed/mastered by Leif Johansen
Video by Jon Sandersen
Label: Pride & Joy Music
Musicians: Jan Thore Grefstad (vocals), Staale Kaasin (bass), Jo Henning Kaasin (guitar), Benjamin Dehli (keyboards), Chris Brush (drums) and Per-Morten Bergseth (drums in video)
Kaasin - Melodic hardrock in the tradition of the great bands from the seventies and early eighties.

title.no: Sequential Circuits Pro-One gjennom en Korg MS-20
title.en: Running Sequential Circuits Pro-One through a Korg MS-20

content.no:
Kj칮rer lyden fra en [Sequential Circuits Pro-One](equipment/instruments/sequential-circuits-pro-one/) gjennom en [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) og styrer dens toneh칮yde. Lyden fra synthene er uprosessert  bortsett fra litt klang fra en [Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978](equipment/effects/chase-bliss-audio-and-meris-cxm-1978/) som er lagt p친.
Instrumenter: [Sequential Circuits Pro-One](equipment/instruments/sequential-circuits-pro-one/) og [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/).
Effekter: [Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978](equipment/effects/chase-bliss-audio-and-meris-cxm-1978/).
content.en:
Running a [Sequential Circuits Pro-One](equipment/instruments/sequential-circuits-pro-one/) through the [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) and controlling its pitch with the audio.
The audio from the synthesizers is unprocessed except a small amount of reverb is added from the [Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978](equipment/effects/chase-bliss-audio-and-meris-cxm-1978/).
Instruments: [Sequential Circuits Pro-One](equipment/instruments/sequential-circuits-pro-one/) and [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/)
Effects: [Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978](equipment/effects/chase-bliss-audio-and-meris-cxm-1978/)

[Dreadbox Erebus v2](equipment/instruments/dreadbox-erebus-v2/) and [Doepfer Dark Energy (v1)](equipment/instruments/doepfer-dark-energy/) playing 3-note paraphonic.
[Doepfer Dark Energy](equipment/instruments/doepfer-dark-energy/) has highest note priority and [Dreadbox Erebus](equipment/instruments/dreadbox-erebus-v2/) has the 2 lowest note priority.

title.no: Innspilling av Fuzz Clavinet p친 "KAASIN - Revelation"
title.en: Recording Fuzz Clavinet for "KAASIN - Revelation"

content.no:
Innspilling av [Hohner Clavinet](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/) med [Fuzz Face](equipment/effects/dallas-arbiter-fuzz-face/) og [Tube Tape Echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) for l친ta Revelation av Kaasin.
Dette er fra tema-/mellomspilldelen og broen.
Det ble ogs친 brukt en [Electro-Harmonix Deluxe Electric Mistress](equipment/effects/electro-harmonix-deluxe-electric-mistress/) og en [Solton Dopplertone](equipment/amplifiers/solton-dopplertone/) p친 [Clavinet](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/)-sporet, men ikke i denne delen av l친ta.
Instrument: [Hohner Clavinet D6](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/)
Effekter: [Dunlop / Dallas Arbiter '93 Fuzz Face (NKT-275)](equipment/effects/dallas-arbiter-fuzz-face/), [Fulltone Tube Tape Echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) og [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/)
Forsterker: [Vox AC15H1TV](equipment/amplifiers/vox-ac15h1tv/)
content.en:
Recording the [Hohner Clavinet](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/) with [Fuzz Face](equipment/effects/dallas-arbiter-fuzz-face/) and [Tube Tape Echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) for the song Revelation by Kaasin.
This is from the theme / interlude part and the bridge.
An [Electro-Harmonix Deluxe Electric Mistress](equipment/effects/electro-harmonix-deluxe-electric-mistress/) and a [Solton Dopplertone](equipment/amplifiers/solton-dopplertone/) were also used on the [Clavinet](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/), but not in this part of the song.
Instrument: [Hohner Clavinet D6](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/)
Effects: [Dunlop / Dallas Arbiter '93 Fuzz Face (NKT-275)](equipment/effects/dallas-arbiter-fuzz-face/), [Fulltone Tube Tape Echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) and [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/)

title.en: Clavinet with Whammy pedal

content.no:
[Hohner Clavinet D6](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/) med en [DigiTech Whammy pedal](equipment/effects/digitech-whammy-5th-gen/).
Det er ogs친 en fuzz pedal, litt slapback ekko og en fj칝rklang i effektkjeden.
Jeg spiller gjennom en [Vox AC15H1TV forsterker](equipment/amplifiers/vox-ac15h1tv/).
Effekter: [DigiTech Whammy (5th Gen)](equipment/effects/digitech-whammy-5th-gen/), [Dunlop / Dallas Arbiter Fuzz Face](equipment/effects/dallas-arbiter-fuzz-face/), [Boss DM-2 Delay](equipment/effects/boss-dm-2-delay/) og [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/)

[Hohner Clavinet D6](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/) with a [DigiTech Whammy pedal](equipment/effects/digitech-whammy-5th-gen/).
I've also added a fuzz pedal, some slapback delay and a spring reverb in the effects chain.
I'm playing through a [Vox AC15H1TV amplifier](equipment/amplifiers/vox-ac15h1tv/).

Debutl친ta fra det norske bandet Kaasin grunnlagt av gitarist Jo Henning Kaasin som har samarbeidet med Glenn Hughes, Joe Lynn Turner, Doogie White og flere. Grunnleggende medlem og l친tskriver i Come Taste the Band.

title.no: Korg Polysix og Fulltone Tube Tape Echo med utslitt b친nd
title.en: Korg Polysix and Fulltone Tube Tape Echo with worn tape

content.no:
[Korg Polysix](equipment/instruments/korg-polysix/) gjennom en [Fulltone Tube Tape Echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) med godt slitt b친nd. Det utslitte b친ndet som gav mye "wow og flutter" og forvrengning av lyden.
Jeg kj칮rte [Korg Polysix'en](equipment/instruments/korg-polysix/) gjennom [b친ndekkoet](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) to ganger og panorerte det hardt til venstre og h칮yre for 친 skape en stereoeffekt og mikset inn det t칮rre direkte signalet
content.en:
[Korg Polysix](equipment/instruments/korg-polysix/) through a [Fulltone Tube Tape Echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) with a heavily worn tape. The worn out tape adding a lot of wow and flutter, audio dropouts and distortion.
I ran the [Korg Polysix](equipment/instruments/korg-polysix/) through the [tape echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) two times and panned it hard left and right to create a stereo effect and mixed in the dry direct signal.

title.no: Fulltone Tube Tape Echo med tangentinstrumenter and trommemaskin
title.en: Fulltone Tube Tape Echo with keyboards and drum machine

content.no:
Testing av [Fulltone Tube Tape Echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) med [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/), [Mellotron M4000D](equipment/instruments/mellotron-m4000d/) og [Arturia Drumbrute](equipment/instruments/arturia-drumbrute/).
For 친 lage en stereoeffekt, er alle instrumentene sendt gjennom [b친ndekkoen](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) to ganger og panorert hardt til h칮yre og venstre. Det er ogs친 lagt p친 litt fj칝rklang fra en [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr. pedal](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/).
Instrumenter: [Korg MS-20 (MK 1)](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/), [Mellotron M4000D](equipment/instruments/mellotron-m4000d/) og [Arturia Drumbrute](equipment/instruments/arturia-drumbrute/)
Effekter: [Fulltone Tube Tape Echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) og [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/)
Step sequencer: [Korg SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/)
Opptaker: Fostex X-28H
content.en:
Testing the [Fulltone Tube Tape Echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) with [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/), [Mellotron M4000D](equipment/instruments/mellotron-m4000d/) and [Arturia Drumbrute](equipment/instruments/arturia-drumbrute/). The second VCO on the [MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) is sequenced by a Korg SQ-1.
I ran all the instruments through the [tape echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) two times and panned it hard left and right to create a stereo effect. I also added some spring reverb from the [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/)
Instruments: [Korg MS-20 (MK 1)](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/), [Mellotron M4000D](equipment/instruments/mellotron-m4000d/) and [Arturia Drumbrute](equipment/instruments/arturia-drumbrute/)
Effects: [Fulltone Tube Tape Echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) and [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/)

Recording equipment: Fostex X-28H

title.no: Roland Dimension D SDD-320 med synther og elektriske pianoer
title.en: Roland Dimension D SDD-320 with synthesizers and electric pianos

content.no:
Tester ut [Roland Dimension D](equipment/effects/roland-dimension-d-sdd-320/) med tangentinstrumenter.
Alle instrumentene er spilt inn direkte med en Whirlwind Direct2 DI-boks, det er ikke brukt noen effekter eller forsterkere bortsett fra [Dimension D](equipment/effects/roland-dimension-d-sdd-320/).
Jeg anbefaler 친 bruke hodetelefoner eller stereoh칮ytalere for 친 best h칮re effekten.
Effekter: [Roland Dimension D SDD-320](equipment/effects/roland-dimension-d-sdd-320/).
Instrumenter: [Hohner Clavinet D6](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/), [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/), [Korg Polysix](equipment/instruments/korg-polysix/), [Logan String Melody II](equipment/instruments/logan-string-melody-ii/), [Rhodes MK I Stage Piano](equipment/instruments/rhodes-mark-i-stage-piano/), [Wurlitzer 200A](equipment/instruments/wurlitzer-200a/), [Yamaha DX7](equipment/instruments/yamaha-dx7/).
content.en:
Testing the [Roland Dimension D](equipment/effects/roland-dimension-d-sdd-320/) with keyboard instruments.
All instruments are recorded directly with a Whirlwind Direct2 DI box, no other effects or amplifiers are used apart from the [Dimension D](equipment/effects/roland-dimension-d-sdd-320/).
I recommend using headphones or stereo speakers for best hearing the effect.
Effects: [Roland Dimension D SDD-320](equipment/effects/roland-dimension-d-sdd-320/).
Instruments: [Hohner Clavinet D6](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/), [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/), [Korg Polysix](equipment/instruments/korg-polysix/), [Logan String Melody II](equipment/instruments/logan-string-melody-ii/), [Rhodes MK I Stage Piano](equipment/instruments/rhodes-mark-i-stage-piano/), [Wurlitzer 200A](equipment/instruments/wurlitzer-200a/), [Yamaha DX7](equipment/instruments/yamaha-dx7/).

title.en: Lo-fi Tape Piano (sample pack)

content.no:
Lo-fi Tape Piano fra Dehli Musikk inneholder lyder av en [Louis Zwicki Pianette](equipment/instruments/louis-zwicki-pianette/) som er spilt inn med kassettopptaker og 3 forskjellige mikrofoner. Forsforsterkerene p친 kassettopptakeren overstyrer litt og gir ekstra overtoner and kassettb친ndet gir kompresjon i tilegg til sm친 endringer i toneh칮yde ('wow' og 'flutter').
Om du vil ha lyden av et perfekt intonert og regulert piano, er nok ikke dette produktet det du er p친 jakt etter. Dette l친ter mer som en [Mellotron- / Chamberlin](equipment/instruments/mellotron-m4000d/)-versjon av en [Pianette](equipment/instruments/louis-zwicki-pianette/).
Lydpakken inneholder 328 .WAV-filer (637,8 MB) og 3 .EXS-filer (295 KB).
Mikrofoner: Televerket Elektrisk Bureau (Telefon mik), JTS CX-516 (Gooseneck mik) og AKG C451E (Stereo par)
Tape recorder: Fostex X-28H
DAW: Logic Pro X
Samples info: 칄n sample pr. tangent (2 for AKG stereo par) pr. mikrofon (328 samples totalt), Bit depth: 24bit, Sample rate: 48kHz
 Lydeksemplene er laget med kun samples fra denne pakken. Det reverserte pianoet p친 starten av introen (f칮rste 14 sekundene) bruker samples som har blitt behandlet og reversert i ettertid.
content.en:
Lo-fi Tape Piano from Dehli Musikk includes the sound of a [Louis Zwicki Pianette](equipment/instruments/louis-zwicki-pianette/) recorded with cassette tape recorder through 3 different microphones. The preamps of the tape recorder are slightly overdriven and the tape adds compression and harmonics as well as wow and flutter (pitch variation).
If you want the sound of a perfectly voiced and regulated grand piano, this may not be the samples for you. This is more like a [Mellotron / Chamberlin](equipment/instruments/mellotron-m4000d/) version of [the Pianette](equipment/instruments/louis-zwicki-pianette/).
The sample pack includes 328 .WAV samples (637.8 MB)  and 3 .EXS files (295 KB).
Microphones: Televerket Elektrisk Bureau (Telephone mic), JTS CX-516 (Gooseneck mic inside) andAKG C451E (Stereo pair)
Tape recorder: Fostex X-28H
DAW: Logic Pro X
Samples info: Single sample per key (2 for AKG stereo pair) per microphone (328 samples in total), Bit depth: 24bit, Sample rate: 48kHz
All the sounds in the examples are made exclusively with samples from this package. The reversed piano in the beginning of the intro (first 14 seconds) uses samples that's reversed and altered in post-processing.

Notene kommer som MIDI signal fra Logic og gjort om til styrespenning med en [Korg SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/).
Effekter som er brukt: [Electro Harmonix Deluxe Memory Man (analog ekko)](equipment/effects/electro-harmonix-deluxe-memory-man/) and [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr. (fj칝rklang)](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/).
content.en:
The arpeggios are MIDI notes in Logic and the [Korg SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/) is used as a MIDI to CV converter.

title.en: Korg MS-20 ESP with guitar

content.no:
[Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) styres av gitar med External Signal Processor (ESP) og kj칮res gjennom en [Fender Twin Reverb forsterker](equipment/amplifiers/fender-twin-reverb/).
VCO1: 1 oktav under gitaren.
VCO2: 1 oktav + 3 halvtoner over gitaren.
Envelope Generator 1 kontrollerer toneh칮yden og f친r den til 친 glidd opp til tonen n친r den trigges og glid ned n친r volumet fra gitaren er under trigger-terskelen.
content.en:
[Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) controlled by guitar with External Signal Processor (ESP) running through a [Fender Twin Reverb Amp](equipment/amplifiers/fender-twin-reverb/).
VCO1: 1 Octave below guitar.
VCO2: 1 Octave + 3 semi tones above guitar.
Envelope Generator 1 controlling the pitch, making it glide up to the note when triggered and glide down when the volume from guitar is below trigger threshold.

title.en: Fender Rhodes - Wet/Dry setup with rotary speaker and Twin Reverb

content.no:
[Fender Rhodes](equipment/instruments/rhodes-mark-i-stage-piano/) med en [Fender Twin Reverb](equipment/amplifiers/fender-twin-reverb/) som t칮rr-/direktelyds-forsterker og en [Solton Dopplertone](equipment/amplifiers/solton-dopplertone/) som v친tsignal/klang-forsterker.
Krets for direktelyd: [Fender Rhodes](equipment/instruments/rhodes-mark-i-stage-piano/) 俱뫮잺 [Fulltone - True-Path ABY-ST](equipment/effects/fulltone-true-path-aby-st/) (A-Out) 俱뫮잺 [Hudson Electronics UK - Broadcast](equipment/effects/hudson-electronics-uk-broadcast/) 俱뫮잺 [Fender - Twin Reverb](equipment/amplifiers/fender-twin-reverb/)
Krets for klanglyd: [Fender Rhodes](equipment/instruments/rhodes-mark-i-stage-piano/) 俱뫮잺 [Fulltone - True-Path ABY-ST](equipment/effects/fulltone-true-path-aby-st/) (B-Out) 俱뫮잺 [Hughes & Kettner - Tube Factor](equipment/effects/hughes-and-kettner-tube-factor/) 俱뫮잺 [Diamond - Memory Lane 2](equipment/effects/diamond-memory-lane-2/) (Delay Only) 俱뫮잺 [VanAmps - Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/) 俱뫮잺 [Solton - Dopplertone](equipment/amplifiers/solton-dopplertone/)

title.en: Fender Rhodes and Korg MS-20

content.no:
Jeg spilte inn en kort live-jam p친 kassett med [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) og [Fender Rhodes MKI](equipment/instruments/rhodes-mark-i-stage-piano/).
VCO 2 p친 [MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) blir styrt av en [Korg SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/) mens VCO 1 blir styrt av tangentene.
Begge instrumentene er plugget direkte inn i Fostex X-28H 4-spors b친ndopptaker.
I effektsl칮yfa til b친ndopptakeren er det en [Van-Amps Sole-Mate Jr. (fj칝rklang)](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/), [Diamond Memory Lane 2 (analog delay)](equipment/effects/diamond-memory-lane-2/) and a [Boss Chorus Ensemble](equipment/effects/boss-ce-1-chorus-ensemble/) (Brukt som mono til "stereo" konverterer).
content.en:
I recorded a short live jam to tape with [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) and [Fender Rhodes MKI](equipment/instruments/rhodes-mark-i-stage-piano/).
VCO 2 on the [MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) is sequenced by the [Korg SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/) while VCO 1 is triggered by the keyboard.
Both instruments are plugged directly to the Fostex X-28H 4-track tape recorder.
In the tape recorder's effects loop I added [Van-Amps Sole-Mate Jr. (spring reverb)](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/), [Diamond Memory Lane 2 (analog delay)](equipment/effects/diamond-memory-lane-2/) and a [Boss Chorus Ensemble](equipment/effects/boss-ce-1-chorus-ensemble/) (Used as mono to "stereo" converter).

title.en: Controlling delay pedal with guitar

content.no:
Kontrollerer ekkotiden til en [Diamond Memory Lane](equipment/effects/diamond-memory-lane-2/) med notene som blir spilt p친 gitaren. Jeg bruker en VCA til en [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) som en expression pedal. Frekvens til volt konvertereren blir brukt til 친 konvertere frekvensen fra gitarsignalet til styrespenningssignal for VCA'en.
Det viste seg ikke 친 v칝re s친 veldig nyttig, men det var et morsomt eksperiment 游뗵
content.en:
Controlling delay time of the [Diamond Memory Lane](equipment/effects/diamond-memory-lane-2/) with the the notes being played on the guitar. I'm using the VCA in the [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) as an expression pedal. The frequency to volt converter is used to convert the frequency from the guitar signal to a controll voltage signal for the VCA.
It didn't turn out to be very useful, but it was a fun experiment 游뗵

title.en: Clavinet D6 - Fuzz Pedal Comparison

content.no:
Instrument: [Hohner - Clavinet D6](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/).
Effektpedaler: [Dunlop / Dallas Arbiter - '93 Fuzz Face (NKT-275)](equipment/effects/dallas-arbiter-fuzz-face/), [Fender - Blender (3-knob)](equipment/effects/fender-blender-3-knob/), [Hudson Electronics, UK - Broadcast](equipment/effects/hudson-electronics-uk-broadcast/) og [Mojo Hand FX - Iron Bell](equipment/effects/mojo-hand-fx-iron-bell/).
Forsterkerinnstillinger: Forsterkeren er stilt inn slik at den ikke vrenger og satt til pentode mode (15 watts). Signal er sendt gjennom "top boost"-preampen. Volum omtrent klokka 10, Treble omtrent klokka 1, Bass omtrent klokka 3 og Top cut omtrent klokka 8.
Pedalinnstillinger: Innstillingene for fuzz-pedalene er like i alle eksemplene. Fuzz-potmeterene er satt til maksimum og output er satt til omtrent 'unity gain'. Tone og colour potmeteret p친 [Iron Bell](equipment/effects/mojo-hand-fx-iron-bell/) er satt til omtrent klokka 12. Selector-bryteren p친 [Fender Blender-pedalen](equipment/effects/fender-blender-3-knob/) er satt til den f칮rste fuzz-innstillingen.
Fuzz-pedalene tar imot og sender samme volum som hverandre men det interne signalet og forvrengningen i pedalene vil v칝re forskjellige. Som man kan h칮re har [Fender Blender-pedalen](equipment/effects/fender-blender-3-knob/) en del mindre forvrengning enn de andre.
[Clavinet'en](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/) er tatt opp med en Whirlwind Direct2 DI-boks og re-amp'et med en Radial X-Amp inn i en [Vox AC15H1TV](equipment/amplifiers/vox-ac15h1tv/).
Forsterkeren er mikket opp med en Shure SM57 og en Sennheiser e 602-II.
P친 intro-melodien er det brukt samme oppsett, men det er i tilegg brukt en [Diamond - Memory Lane 2](equipment/effects/diamond-memory-lane-2/) og en [VanAmps - Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/)
content.en:
Instrument: [Hohner - Clavinet D6](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/).
Effects pedals: [Dunlop / Dallas Arbiter - '93 Fuzz Face (NKT-275)](equipment/effects/dallas-arbiter-fuzz-face/), [Fender - Blender (3-knob)](equipment/effects/fender-blender-3-knob/), [Hudson Electronics, UK - Broadcast](equipment/effects/hudson-electronics-uk-broadcast/) and [Mojo Hand FX - Iron Bell](equipment/effects/mojo-hand-fx-iron-bell/).
Amplifier settings: The amplifier is set to very clean and pentode mode (15 watts). The signal is fed through the top boost preamp channel. Volume about 10 o'clock, Treble about 1 o'clock, Bass about 3 o'clock and Top cut about 8 o'clock.
Pedal settings: The settings for the fuzz pedals is the same in each example. The fuzz amount is set to maximum and output is set to approximately unity gain. The tone and colour pots for the [Iron Bell](equipment/effects/mojo-hand-fx-iron-bell/) are set to 12 o'clock. The selector switch on the [Fender Blender](equipment/effects/fender-blender-3-knob/) is set to the first fuzz setting.
The fuzz pedals receive and send the same amount of signal as each other but the gain may vary inside the fuzz circuit. As you may hear the [Fender Blender](equipment/effects/fender-blender-3-knob/) is a lot cleaner although the fuzz amount on each pedal is set to maximum.
[The Clavinet](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/) is recorder with Whirlwind Direct2 DI box and re-amped with Radial X-Amp into a [Vox AC15H1TV](equipment/amplifiers/vox-ac15h1tv/).
The amplifier is miced up with a Shure SM57 and a Sennheiser e 602-II.
On the intro I used the same setup, but with a [Diamond - Memory Lane 2](equipment/effects/diamond-memory-lane-2/) and a [VanAmps - Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/) in line.

Utstyr: [Fender Stratocaster](equipment/instruments/fender-stratocaster/), [Diamond Memory Lane 2](equipment/effects/diamond-memory-lane-2/), [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) og [Vox AC15H1TV](equipment/amplifiers/vox-ac15h1tv/).
[MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) sin VCA blir brukt som en expression-pedal for [Diamond Memory Lane](equipment/effects/diamond-memory-lane-2/) sin ekkotid. VCA'en er kontrollert av Envelope Generator 1 og envelope'n er trigget av knappen til venstre for tangentene.
content.en:
Equipment used: [Fender Stratocaster](equipment/instruments/fender-stratocaster/), [Diamond Memory Lane 2](equipment/effects/diamond-memory-lane-2/), [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) and [Vox AC15H1TV](equipment/amplifiers/vox-ac15h1tv/).
[The MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/)'s VCA is used as an expression pedal for the [Diamond Memory Lane](equipment/effects/diamond-memory-lane-2/)'s delay time. The VCA is controlled by Envelope Generator 1 and the envelope is triggered by the push button.

title.en: Setup for semi sequenced Korg MS-20

content.no:
Med dette oppsette kan du spille VCO 1 mens VCO 2 blir styrt av [SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/). [SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/) sin klokkehastinghet/tempo blir kontrollert av [MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) sin Modulation Generator.

Oppsett av [SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/) for [MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/):
- Sett CV-A range til 8V (Hz/V):
- Sett polaritet for GATE OUT til negativ

Tilkobling av [SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/) til [MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/):
- Koble [SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/) sin CV-A OUT eller CV-B OUT ttil [MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) sin VCO 2 CV IN
- Koble [MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) sin Retangle-utgang fra Modulation Generator til [SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/) sin SYNC IN

Valgfritt:
- Om du vil at [SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/) skal styre envelope'n instedenfor keyboardet, koble [SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/) sin GATE-A OUT eller GATE-B OUT til [MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) sin TRIG IN
content.en:
This setup makes you play the VCO 1 while the VCO 2 is sequenced by the [SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/). The [SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/)'s clock speed is controlled by [the MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/)'s Modulation Generator.

Setting up the [SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/) for [MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/):
- Set the CV-A range to 8V (Hz/V):
- Set the polarity of GATE OUT to negative

Connecting the [SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/) to [the MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/):
- Connect [SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/)'s CV-A OUT or CV-B OUT to [MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/)'s VCO 2 CV IN
- Connect [MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/)'s Rectangle output from Modulation Generator to [SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/)'s SYNC IN

Optional:
- If you want the [SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/) to trigger the envelope instead of the keyboard connect [SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/)'s GATE-A OUT or GATE-B OUT to [MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/)'s TRIG IN

title.en: Clavinet D6 with effects pedals

content.no:
Instrument: [Hohner - Clavinet D6](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/)
Effektpedaler: [Real McCoy Custom - Picture Wah](equipment/effects/real-mccoy-custom-picture-wah/), Electro Harmonix - Small Stone, [TC Electronic - SCF Stereo Chorus Flanger](equipment/effects/tc-electronic-scf-stereo-chorus-flanger/), [Boss - DM-2 Delay (MN3005)](equipment/effects/boss-dm-2-delay/), [Diamond - Memory Lane 2](equipment/effects/diamond-memory-lane-2/) og [VanAmps - Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/)
[Clavinet'en](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/) er spilt inn med Whirlwind Direct2 DI-boks og re-ampet med Radial X-Amp inn i en [Vox AC15H1TV forsterker](equipment/amplifiers/vox-ac15h1tv/).
Forsterkeren er mikket opp med en Shure SM57 og en Sennheiser e 602-II.
content.en:
Instrument: [Hohner - Clavinet D6](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/)
Effects pedals: [Real McCoy Custom - Picture Wah](equipment/effects/real-mccoy-custom-picture-wah/), Electro Harmonix - Small Stone, [TC Electronic - SCF Stereo Chorus Flanger](equipment/effects/tc-electronic-scf-stereo-chorus-flanger/), [Boss - DM-2 Delay (MN3005)](equipment/effects/boss-dm-2-delay/), [Diamond - Memory Lane 2](equipment/effects/diamond-memory-lane-2/) and [VanAmps - Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/)
[The Clavinet](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/) is recorder with Whirlwind Direct2 DI box and re-amped with Radial X-Amp into a [Vox AC15H1TV](equipment/amplifiers/vox-ac15h1tv/).
The amplifier is miced up with a Shure SM57 and a Sennheiser e 602-II.

title.en: Clavinet solo

content.no:
[Clavinet](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/)-solo p친 "Don't You Wanna Know?" med Set One's Cap live p친 Wrightegaarden i Langesund.
[Clavinet D6](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/) med [Real McCoy Picture Wah](equipment/effects/real-mccoy-custom-picture-wah/) gjennom en [Vox AC15H1TV](equipment/amplifiers/vox-ac15h1tv/).
Set One's Cap: Kasper Waag (Trommer), Sondre Gautefald (Bass og koring), Benjamin Dehli (Orgel, [Rhodes](equipment/instruments/rhodes-mark-i-stage-piano/) og [Clavinet](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/)), Martin Torgersen (Synth), Joakim Juul (Vokal) og Carl-Viktor Guttormsen (Gitar).
content.en:
[Clavinet](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/) solo on "Don't You Wanna Know?" with Set One's Cap live at Wrightegaarden in Langesund.
[Clavinet D6](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/) with [Real McCoy Picture Wah](equipment/effects/real-mccoy-custom-picture-wah/) through a [Vox AC15H1TV](equipment/amplifiers/vox-ac15h1tv/).
Set One's Cap: Kasper Waag (Drums), Sondre Gautefald (Bass and backing vocals), Benjamin Dehli (Organ, [Rhodes](equipment/instruments/rhodes-mark-i-stage-piano/) and [Clavinet](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/)), Martin Torgersen (Synth), Joakim Juul (Vocals) and Carl-Viktor Guttormsen (Guitar).

title.en: Korg CX-3 (analog) with effects pedals

content.no:
Her er noen lyder man kan lage med [Korg CX-3](equipment/instruments/korg-cx-3/) og effektpedaler.
Videoen er laget for 친 demonstrere allsidigheten til instrumentet n친r man kombinerer det med effektpedaler.
H친per du liker det og legg gjerne igjen en kommentar.
Signalkjeden er: [Goodrich Volume Pedal](equipment/effects/goodrich-h-120-highboy/)  [EHX English Muff'n](equipment/effects/electro-harmonix-english-muffn/)  [Diamond Memory Lane 2](equipment/effects/diamond-memory-lane-2/)  [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/)  [Neo Ventilator](equipment/effects/neo-instruments-ventilator/)  [HardWire RV-7](equipment/effects/hardwire-rv-7/).
content.en:
Here are sounds you can make with a [Korg CX-3](equipment/instruments/korg-cx-3/) and effects pedals.
This video only demonstrate the versatility of the instrument in conjunction with effects pedals, so don't worry about my sloppy playing.
Hope you like it, and feel free to leave a comment.
